cast.name: 克里斯托弗·李 Christopher Lee

this_title: Dracula Nazi Hunter: How I Learned to Love Christopher Lee and Drink Atomic Bombs
introduction: When director Mora landed in Prague in 1984 with Christopher Lee there was a military honor welcome for Lee. This was the beginning of a saga revealing Lee's past life as a Nazi hunter in WW2 and his involvement in the assassination of SS chief Reinhard Heydrich, key architect of the Holocaust.—Philippe Mora
chinese_title: Dracula Nazi Hunter: How I Learned to Love Christopher Lee and Drink Atomic Bombs
